title: Cristallina
text: The Cristallina is a <a href="mountain">mountain</a> of the <a href="Lepontine%20Alps">Lepontine Alps</a>, located in the Swiss canton of <a href="Ticino">Ticino</a>. It is situated between the valleys of <a href="Leventina">Leventina</a>, Val Bavona and Valle di Peccia (the latter two belonging to the <a href="Valle%20Maggia">Valle Maggia</a>. On the west side of the mountain is located the Passo Cristallina with the <a href="Cristallina%20Hut">Cristallina Hut</a>.
